Class WtTextChar

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WToken
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.token.WtTextChar
public class WtTextChar extends WToken
Text character token for WYSIWYG editor.
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting
